name: A bird in a Zen garden
name_original: A bird in a Zen garden
description:
The goal is simple, reach the top... and maybe find some enlightenment along your journey.

My first  game.

I wanted to create a game to develop my skills as well as create something I can do the sound design for. 

I took many influences from Eastern Philosphy, Wabi-Sabi and Zen gardens (but you probably already figured that out).   

I want to thank the whole itch community for inspiring me countless times, as well as, the unreal engine community for your resourcefulness and especially you, the player, for giving me your time and attention. I hope you enjoy.

Music done by my self, check out my soundcloud: www.soundcloud.com/lvlk/tracks

CONTROLS:

Left key - Fly left

Right key - Fly right

to exit press alt+f4
